code: import React from"react";import FullScreenSection from"./FullScreenSection";import{Box,Heading}from"@chakra-ui/react";import Card from"./Card";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const projects=[{title:"React Space",description:"Handy tool belt to create amazing AR components in a React app, with redux integration via middlewareï¸",getImageSrc:()=>require("../images/photo1.jpg")},{title:"React Infinite Scroll",description:"A scrollable bottom sheet with virtualisation support, native animations at 60 FPS and fully implemented in JS land ðŸ”¥ï¸",getImageSrc:()=>require("../images/photo2.jpg")},{title:"Photo Gallery",description:"A One-stop shop for photographers to share and monetize their photos, allowing them to have a second source of income",getImageSrc:()=>require("../images/photo3.jpg")},{title:"Event planner",description:"A mobile application for leisure seekers to discover unique events and activities in their city with a few taps",getImageSrc:()=>require("../images/photo4.jpg")}];const ProjectsSection=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FullScreenSection,{backgroundColor:"#14532d",isDarkBackground:true,p:8,alignItems:"flex-start",spacing:8,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h1",id:"projects-section",children:"Featured Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{display:"grid",gridTemplateColumns:"repeat(2,minmax(0,1fr))",gridGap:8,children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:project.title,description:project.description,imageSrc:project.getImageSrc()},project.title))})]});};export default ProjectsSection;
